rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you for watching over my Rex.
As his guardian, it makes me happy to
see him with such dependable friends.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0002
rows.name:
He's great at charging straight forward
towards his goal, but someone needs to
make sure he stays on the right path.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0003
rows.name:
With you all there to guide him,
I feel safe knowing he'll do all right.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, it's just something about the look
on his face. I think he must have grown
a lot in a short space of time.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0005
rows.name:
I can tell, you know. I was the one who
raised him all these years.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0006
rows.name:
Promise me you'll take good care
of my boy, all right?

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0007
rows.name:
Thanks for taking the time out of your
busy schedule to pay us all a visit.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm sure the kids would be delighted
if you said hello.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0009
rows.name:
They're always asking for you,
wondering when you'll show up.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0010
rows.name: Aww. Yeah, I should do that.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0013
rows.name:
I just want you to know that I'm
always here for you.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0014
rows.name:
Just remember that when the going
gets tough. I'll set you straight, do
you hear?
